attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Overall, just a waste of space and storage on my device😐😑😐. The pop up adds were ridiculous! Rather do better things than waste my time on app...do better

attributes.title: This app is the worst
attributes.review: This app is a good representation of how bad trump is lol. The j in his name Donald j trump does not in fact stand for jenius🤡. This app was not or will never be good over all the worst app I’ve had in my whole life!!! Also It should be called 🤡Clown 2020 and than maybe It would earn the one star.

attributes.title: Text messages required
attributes.review: I wanted the app, but I could not get into it with out accepting to allow them to text and call me. So therefore, I did not get past the sign up page, but I did not like what I did get to see.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I thought downloading this app was going to cure my liberal fever, but every day - even after downloading this app- I seem to be moving more and more to the left.  If you too are afflicted with the liberal rainbow; this app is not for you.✨ ✨🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♀️✨✨

attributes.title: Thought it would be a promising app
attributes.review: I was so excited to hear all the wonderful things Mr. Trump would be doing. Well come to find out he is a racist, homophobic, xenophobic, child predator, sexist, rich, dumb, bigot! I thought He was a republican, not a dictator! 10/10 scared for America. 10/10 fix your tan.

attributes.title: Installed a virus on my devices
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to my phone and iPad as did my family. After a couple of days it completely crashed my phone and all other devices it was installed on.

attributes.title: Confused 👁👄👁
attributes.review:
I thought this app was for the BLACK LIVES MATTER movement that should not even be happening because they should have gotten their rights and treated as equals so long ago but it turn out it’s about an obese orange cheese puff. Deleting immediately. Very disappointed. 
BLACK LIVES MATTER✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: Worst app I have ever used
attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible. It took forever to download and hardly worked once it downloaded and made my phone crash many times. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: App is ok.
attributes.review: Love getting news straight (and honest) from The President. Problem with this app is it keeps showing duplicate feeds. Please fix this already!

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: Don’t download this app as soon as it downloaded a whole bunch of disgusting roaches and bugs stuff came truly disgusting If you download this app it will hurt ur eyes and making u almost blinding you from ugliness that’s too hurtful to the human eye.
